snippet: Mosquito-borne viruses are showing up unexpectedly in affluent countries where they have been largely unknown.
abstract: Mosquito-borne viruses are showing up unexpectedly in affluent countries where they have been largely unknown, including dengue fever in Japan and chikungunya in United States.
lead_paragraph: Mosquito-borne viruses are showing up unexpectedly in affluent countries where they have been largely unknown.

headline.print_headline: Mosquito-Borne Viruses Hit Japan and the U.S.
headline.main: Mosquito-Borne Viruses Hit Japan and the U.S.
